    PPA Assignment 1 - ImageViewer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageViewer()
      Create an ImageViewer and display its GUI on screen.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int averageImageWidth()
      returns the average width of the images viewed so far
      void computeMaxHeight()
      iterates though all the images in the album and stores the height value of the image with the largest width in the maxHeight variable to enable the gui to be initialised according to the size of the largest image
      void computeMaxWidth()
      iterates through all the images in the album and stores the width value of the image with the largest width in a field to enable the gui to be initialised according to the size of the largest image
      void displayImage()
      displays the image from the album
      void displayName()
      displays the name of the image in the gui
      void fishEye()
      applies the fish eye effect to a picture
      int getNumberOfImagesViewed()
      this method returns the number of images viewed so far.
      void nextImage()
      shows the next image in the album.
      void previousImage()
      shows the previous image in the album.
      void showDimension()
      displays the dimension (Height x Width) of the image in the gui

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageViewer

        public ImageViewer()
        Create an ImageViewer and display its GUI on screen. Creates an album. Instantiates the fields. calls a method to compute the maximum image height and width and sets up the gui according to that. calls methods to display the first image and also it's name and size.

    • Method Detail

      • averageImageWidth

        public int averageImageWidth()
        returns the average width of the images viewed so far

      • computeMaxHeight

        public void computeMaxHeight()
        iterates though all the images in the album and stores the height value of the image with the largest width in the maxHeight variable to enable the gui to be initialised according to the size of the largest image

      • computeMaxWidth

        public void computeMaxWidth()
        iterates through all the images in the album and stores the width value of the image with the largest width in a field to enable the gui to be initialised according to the size of the largest image

      • displayImage

        public void displayImage()
        displays the image from the album

      • displayName

        public void displayName()
        displays the name of the image in the gui

      • fishEye

        public void fishEye()
        applies the fish eye effect to a picture

      • getNumberOfImagesViewed

        public int getNumberOfImagesViewed()
        this method returns the number of images viewed so far. (Viewing the same image twice counts as 2 views)

      • nextImage

        public void nextImage()
        shows the next image in the album. If the program is at the last image of the album, then jumps to the first

      • previousImage

        public void previousImage()
        shows the previous image in the album. If the program is at the first image of the album, then jumps to the last

      • showDimension

        public void showDimension()
        displays the dimension (Height x Width) of the image in the gui
